name: XenoBloom (itch)
description:
A sandbox growing game where you shape the evolution of an alien ecosystem.



Are you a God, a Scientist, or just an Observer?


AVAILABLE NOW ON STEAM!

SplatterCatGaming's Awesome Video

Highland Arrow Recommendation

IndieHaven Review

PressKit



Unique to XenoBloom is its use of Cellular Automata to decide if plants live or die:


Just watching their behavior can create a trance-like state of wonder.


Collect DNA to evolve more complex life.



Gather enough power and you can shape the world itself!



  • Build your ideal garden
  • Control the rules of survival
  • Harvest plants to evolve new life
  • Modify the behaviors of your plants



  • Study, Create, or just Relax
  • 3 Game Modes: Normal, Scientist, Observer
  • No Fail Condition
  • Beautiful Original Soundtrack
  • Ongoing updates
  • Easily moddable


Watch me play through the first few minutes
